data.name: Evens and odds
data.description: Your task is as follows : define a function evensOdds, that take an array and that splits it into two different arrays. One of them contains all even numbers and the other all the odd numbers (both arrays should have the numbers in the same order they appear in the original array). Result should be returned as an object with two attributes evens and odds. {evens : [all_even_numbers], odds : [all_odd_numbers]} Some examples : evensOdds([7,8,1,2]) here the even numbers are 8 and 2, and the odd numbers are 7 and 1, so the result must be : { evens : [8,2], odds : [7,1] } Let's check another example evensOdds([-7,11,17]) here all numbers are odd, so the result must be : { evens : [], odds : [-7,11,17] } Enjoy :)
